metadata.description: Name of the environment (used as prefix for all resources)

Tags to apply to all resources
GPT model capacity in 1K TPM units (e.g. 10 = 10K tokens/min, 100 = 100K TPM)

Topology source: "static" reads pre-built JSON (instant), "live" queries graph backend.

properties.description: AI Foundry Project for the Autonomous Network NOC demo

metadata.description: Name of the Container Apps environment
Azure region
Resource tags
Subnet ID for VNet integration. When set, all outbound traffic routes through the VNet, enabling private DNS resolution for Cosmos DB private endpoints.

env.value: [union(createArray(createObject('name', 'PROJECT_ENDPOINT', 'value', reference('aiFoundry').outputs.projectEndpoint.value), createObject('name', 'AI_FOUNDRY_PROJECT_NAME', 'value', reference('aiFoundry').outputs.projectName.value), createObject('name', 'MODEL_DEPLOYMENT_NAME', 'value', 'gpt-4.1'), createObject('name', 'CORS_ORIGINS', 'value', parameters('corsOrigins')), createObject('name', 'GRAPH_BACKEND', 'value', parameters('graphBackend')), createObject('name', 'TOPOLOGY_SOURCE', 'value', parameters('topologySource')), createObject('name', 'COSMOS_NOSQL_ENDPOINT', 'value', reference('cosmosNoSql').outputs.cosmosNoSqlEndpoint.value), createObject('name', 'AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID', 'value', subscription().subscriptionId), createObject('name', 'AZURE_RESOURCE_GROUP', 'value', format('{0}{1}', variables('abbrs').resourceGroup, parameters('environmentName'))), createObject('name', 'AI_SEARCH_NAME', 'value', reference('search').outputs.name.value), createObject('name', 'AZURE_SEARCH_ENDPOINT', 'value', reference('search').outputs.endpoint.value), createObject('name', 'RUNBOOKS_INDEX_NAME', 'value', parameters('runbooksIndexName')), createObject('name', 'TICKETS_INDEX_NAME', 'value', parameters('ticketsIndexName')), createObject('name', 'STORAGE_ACCOUNT_NAME', 'value', reference('storage').outputs.name.value), createObject('name', 'AI_FOUNDRY_NAME', 'value', reference('aiFoundry').outputs.foundryName.value), createObject('name', 'EMBEDDING_MODEL', 'value', 'text-embedding-3-small'), createObject('name', 'EMBEDDING_DIMENSIONS', 'value', '1536'), createObject('name', 'FABRIC_WORKSPACE_ID', 'value', parameters('fabricWorkspaceId')), createObject('name', 'DEFAULT_SCENARIO', 'value', parameters('defaultScenario'))), createArray())]
